comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: The Misses Ripley were artists who specialized in leatherwork: carved screens, wall panels, jewel boxes, book covers, etc. In this image you can see there are hides hanging over the upper banister. query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F70810F73E5A15738...
